price: 109. Ee raac waxa (Qur’aanka) laguu waxyoodo (Nabiyow) samirna inta Alle ka kala xukumin (dadka). Isagaana u wanaagsan inta garsoorta.
arabic: وَٱتَّبِعۡ مَا يُوحَىٰٓ إِلَيۡكَ وَٱصۡبِرۡ حَتَّىٰ يَحۡكُمَ ٱللَّهُۚ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡحَٰكِمِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-ittabiʿ mā yūḥā ilayka wa-iṣ'bir ḥattā yaḥkuma al-lahu wahuwa khayru al-ḥākimīna
